footnotes.text: 1Abraham Lincoln wrote the account in its entirety.

2Stuart & Lincoln rented their office as a jury room for grand and petit juries of
                  theSangamon County Circuit Court.  The court paid them $36 per year in rent between July 1837 and December 1840.Stuart & Lincoln rented office to Sangamon County Circuit Court, Martha L. Benner and Cullom Davis et al., eds.,The Law Practice of Abraham Lincoln: Complete Documentary Edition, 2d edition (Springfield: Illinois Historic Preservation Agency, 2009),http://www.lawpracticeofabrahamlincoln.org/Details.aspx?case=141179.
